data.title: 100 Days of BNS: Day 10 - Smart Contract Upgrade ‚Äî BNS V2 is coming!
data.text:
There is a tremendous amount of work happening at breakneck pace at Bitbns. We have been keenly observing the decentralised finance space and in order to ensure BNS token contract remains in sync with some of the rapid developments that are happening, we have been working on V2 version of the contract. 

 We have added some new capabilities in the smart contract to further be ready for certain Defi integrations that we would implement going forward. Stay tuned as they unravel gradually.

data.title: 100 Days of BNS: Day 10 - 33% off on Margin Trading Fee with BNS!
data.text: We‚Äôre excited to launch another utility for users today. Margin lending fees can be now paid by users using BNS. Bitbns margin trading has pretty high liquidity from users trading on the platform starting from Aug 17. üòç

data.title: 100 Days of BNS: Day 9 - Chainlink (LINK) on Bitbns
data.text: We keep identifying which tokens can add value to our users trading experience and we are pleased to announce the launch of Chainlink (LINK) on Bitbns today. Deposits for Chainlink have commenced and users would be able to trade Chainlink from Aug 10, 10PM IST. üòç

data.title: 100 Days of BNS: Day 8 - Hello Indonesia
data.text:
We‚Äôre launching in a new country ‚Äî Indonesia. Indonesia is one of the largest open markets in the world and a rapidly growing internet population trying access to new services. Bitbns already has users from Indonesia who trade on USDT markets. We want to open up fiat access to the Indonesian market and welcome Indonesian users. 

 So if you are an Indonesian user sign up complete KYC and start transacting for free. You would be able to trade an array of tokens which are currently not available in major Indonesian exchanges. üòç

data.title: 100 Days of BNS: Day 7 - Bitbns Pool Sales
data.text:
We are bringing pool sales for our users with an exciting twist of BNS. This is going to be pretty interesting and exciting. The first major pool sale is going to happen on 15th August.

 We call it the MRP se Azaadi Pool Sale aptly titled with the independence day event. It would happen at 12 noon India time (UTC +5:30). üòç

data.title: 100 Days of BNS: Day 6 - Discounts on Instant Withdrawals with BNS
data.text: Instant withdrawals limit has been increased to 25 lacs a day. We started withdrawals with 1 lac a day and have been able to sequentially ramp up our verification flow to ensure we can seamlessly facilitate 25 lacs a day worth of withdrawals. üòç

data.title: 100 Days of BNS: Day 5 - BNS is listed on Uniswap
data.text: BNS is now listed on Uniswap and you can try the BNS-ETH trade pair today. üòç

data.title: 100 Days of BNS: Day 4 - Spend BNS with Buyhatke Gift Cards (Stay Tuned)
data.text: Remember we mentioned building an ecosystem for our products with BNS at its centre? We're laying the foundation of it. Announcement No. 4 is going to be Buyhatke Gift Cards with extra discounts, only for BNS token holders, on both online & offline purchases.

data.title: 100 Days of BNS: Day 3 - Automated Trading made easy ‚Äî Bitbns now on BitUniverse
data.text:
One of those core features is trading on Bitbns and the liquidity available on the exchange. As we have always said, one of the critical aims that we look forward to is empowering users to save money or make money when they are doing anything. 

 Today we are working on unveiling a sort of a tool that we are putting in the hands of users through this integration. Today we are announcing the integration of Bitbns with Bituniverse (BU) app. 

 Bituniverse is a major trading app used by 100s of thousands of people on a daily basis. It has a rating of 4.6 and is loved by users across the board. With Bituniverse, you would be able to trade on Bitbns using trading bots even when you do not have any sort of trading knowledge. 

 Trading bots essentially automate different trading strategies for you.

data.title: Introducing Arbitrager App:
data.text: We are happy to be consistently moving towards our goals of building better, more efficient and diverse trading experiences for you. Recently, we launched Arbitrager ‚Äî your go-to app for speediest arbitrage trades, and we thought we should let you know more about it.

data.title: Introducing Bitdroplet
data.text:
Ladies & Gentlemen,

 We give you Bitdroplet - world‚Äôs first Systematic Purchase Plan (SPP) for Bitcoin.

data.title: 100 Days of BNS: Day 2 - 2nd BNS Utility is here Earn even more on FIPs with BNS
data.text: Stake your BNS to earn additional interest on Bitbns Fixed Incom Plans.

data.title: 100 Days of BNS: Day 1 - BNS utilities start ! Woohoo
data.text: The very first utility of BNS token finally goes live today - Trading Fee Discount for BNS hodlers. Activate 'Pay Fee via BNS' in your wallets section to start spending your BNS tokens for trading fee.
